TextBlock.Text: JESSE: Our efforts to terraform this planet aren't doing so well. We've tried to flee from Nominated Anomaly, but that damned moon, well...
THINPIN: What he wants to say is that Nominated Anomaly's temperature went up drastically, so we moved from there to Migrated Pastures and this planet. Or tried to, at least.
KRABS: Come on! We need to flee! The atmospheric pressure is rapidly rising! Let's go back to Migrated Pastures!
THINPIN: Yeah, that's a good idea. Let's go! Come on, Jesse!
